p.i: A curved scepter tipped with a ruby-eyed, flaring cobra head.

description.p: Benefit. All snakes regard you with a friendly attitude unless you do something to upset them.
Benefit. Once per day, you can throw the staff to the ground. It becomes a giant snake for 5 rounds that obeys your mental commands. If the giant snake goes to 0 HP, it reverts into a staff.
Curse. You have disadvantage on attacks and casting hostile spells targeting snakes.
